column1: Is the bank required to send me a monthly statement on my checking or savings account?
column2: Can my bank change my deposit account statement cycle date?
column3: I need a copy of my bank statement (or other records). Can you help?
column4: Am I entitled to get my cancelled checks with my bank statement?
column5: Can a bank refuse to let me open a checking account?
column6: My bank stopped providing withdrawal receipts. Is this legal?
column7: My bank notified me that it is no longer a retail bank and that it had transferred my account to another bank. Can it do this?
column8: On an account with a Power of Attorney (POA), what happens after the accountholder is deceased?
